name: Physicalypse (KenneyJam2017)
description:
You wake up in a strange town with weird physics! Survive and escape this town!

Control: Movement: WASD       Aiming/Shooting: Mouse

Credits

Done in a Game Jam called (Kenney Jam 2017) Theme "It's a feature, not a bug!"

  • Development: Danar Kayfi
  • Graphic: Kenney
  • Game engine: Unity
  • Music: Fear and Horror - Stratkat (The Open Game Art Bundle)
